name: part_009
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ重大発表】3DLIVE！！重大発表！！【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [0kGVDYAKcGc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performs her song "Kira Kira" on stage with a vibrant backdrop and dynamic lighting.
Transition screen showing the song credits for "Kira Kira" and the Minato Aqua logo.
An announcement trailer for Minato Aqua's second solo live concert, featuring highlights and graphics.
Promotional slides displaying various concert merchandise items and ticket sale information.

subtitles.original: ほら もっともっと出したいわ お腹いっぱい代わりたくて振り絞ったんだ
subtitles.english: Look, I want to bring out more and more, I squeezed it all out wanting to change completely

subtitles.original: 描いた未来を好きになりたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to learn to love the future I envisioned

subtitles.original: きらきらと輝こうか 間違えちゃっても大丈夫
subtitles.english: Shall we shine brightly? It's okay even if we make mistakes

subtitles.original: できないことできるように なれるよ 先は長いから
subtitles.english: We'll be able to do what we can't do now, because there's a long way ahead

subtitles.original: 疲れちゃったら止まろうか 少し眠ったら元通り
subtitles.english: Shall we stop if we get tired? Once we sleep a bit, we'll be back to normal

subtitles.original: したいことしたいように それじゃ私じゃないでしょ
subtitles.english: Doing what I want, the way I want, otherwise it wouldn't be me

subtitles.original: 忘れないよこの思いは 重ねてもっと届くように
subtitles.english: I won't forget these feelings, so that they stack up and reach further

subtitles.original: 変えられるんだ変えていくんだ きらきらしたいから
subtitles.english: I can change, I'm going to change, because I want to sparkle

subtitles.original: 今日もおはよう 振り返る今日の私は
subtitles.english: Good morning today too, looking back at myself today

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっとだけ強くなれそう みたい
subtitles.english: It feels like I might have become just a little bit stronger

subtitles.original: 来ない明日も 何だか自然な感じだ
subtitles.english: Even a tomorrow that won't come feels somewhat natural now

subtitles.original: いつも通りはもっと楽しくしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try making the "usual" more fun

subtitles.original: 怖いよ実際だけどもう一回 乾いたハート振り絞っていこう
subtitles.english: It's actually scary, but one more time, let's squeeze out our parched hearts

subtitles.original: 降りたい私が おいでおいでするから
subtitles.english: Because the me that wants to step down is calling out "come here, come here"

subtitles.original: 未体験だよ
subtitles.english: It's an unexperienced world

subtitles.original: きらきらと輝こうか 間違えちゃっても大丈夫
subtitles.english: Shall we shine brightly? It's okay even if we make mistakes

subtitles.original: できないことできるように なれるよ 先は長いから
subtitles.english: We'll be able to do what we can't do now, because there's a long way ahead

subtitles.original: 疲れちゃったら止まろうか 少し眠ったら元通り
subtitles.english: Shall we stop if we get tired? Once we sleep a bit, we'll be back to normal

subtitles.original: したいことしたいように それじゃ私じゃないでしょ
subtitles.english: Doing what I want, the way I want, otherwise it wouldn't be me

subtitles.original: 忘れないよこの思いは
subtitles.english: I won't forget these feelings

subtitles.original: 重ねてもっと届くように
subtitles.english: So that they stack up and reach further

subtitles.original: 変えられるんだ変えていくんだ きらきらしたいから
subtitles.english: I can change, I'm going to change, because I want to sparkle

subtitles.original: 重なる強さ
subtitles.english: The strength of stacking up

subtitles.original: ダメな私 ずっとずっと歌うよ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm useless, I'll keep singing forever and ever

subtitles.original: 輝けること 変われちゃうこと
subtitles.english: The fact that I can shine, the fact that I can change

subtitles.original: ダメな私 ずっとずっと見ていてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to keep watching me forever, even if I'm useless

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ きらきら 作詞・作曲: DECO*27
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua - Kira Kira / Lyrics & Composition: DECO*27

subtitles.original: みなさんどうも、こんあくあー！湊あくあです！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, Kon-Aqua! I'm Minato Aqua!

subtitles.original: この度、湊あくあのソロライブが開催決定！
subtitles.english: It's been decided that Minato Aqua's solo live will be held!

subtitles.original: 『あくあ色スーパー☆どり～む』から1年半、みんなとの約束、守りに来たよ！
subtitles.english: A year and a half since "Aqua-iro Super☆Dream", I've come to keep my promise to everyone!

subtitles.original: 2022年1月28日、豊洲PIT＆オンラインで開催予定！
subtitles.english: Scheduled to be held on January 28, 2022, at Toyosu PIT & online!

subtitles.original: 今年もみんなと会えるの楽しみだな！
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to seeing everyone again this year!

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ ワンマンライブ2022 『あくあ色 in わんだ～らんど♪』
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua One-Man Live 2022 "Aqua-iro in Wonderland♪"

subtitles.original: ねぇ、今名前ダサいって思った？
subtitles.english: Hey, did you just think the name is lame?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、こらー！でしょ！
subtitles.english: Hey, cut it out!

subtitles.original: ねぇってばー！
subtitles.english: I mean it!
